Weapon Crest：

new:
Main weapons, torso armor, and certain special equipment come with one Crest slot from the beginning.

<COL ffdc78>If you want to attach more than one Crest to other armor or the same equipment, you can create high-quality equipment (+1 to +3) that allows you to attach more Crests by synthesizing Refined Materials during Item Crafting.</COL>

Additionally, equipment with attached Crests can be reattached by destroying the Crests.
